message.content:
Step 1: Identify the three specific line items from the cash flow statement.
• The addition in the amount owed for goods or services received on credit is reflected in the "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" line item.
• The acquisition of property, plant and equipment is shown in the "Purchase of Fixed Assets" line.
• The cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is given in the "Beginning Balance" line under Cash and Cash Equivalents.

Step 2: Extract the values:
• "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" has an Amount of 247000.00.
• "Purchase of Fixed Assets" has an Amount of 85889.19.
• "Beginning Balance" has an Amount of 8000000.00.

Step 3: Present the answer in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "247000.00",
    "value2": "85889.19",
    "value3": "8000000.00"
  }
}
